author: bmwlego
title: Best 98 Cents I Ever Spent at the LEGO Store!
review:
I bought 6 of these sets for 98 cents each this summer at the LEGO Store in Orlando. I wish I bought more! All of the letter tiles (A-Z with others) are printed and you get about 60 of them. Also included are 4 Metallic Silver 1x1 round plates and 4 Metallic Silver 1x2 plates with grills. Metallic Silver! These are a great bonus in my mind. I have never been happier with a 98 cent set before. I have used the letters to make signs for a book store that I built and posted pics on my brickshelf gallery. Check it out at:

http://www.brickshelf.com/cgi-bin/gallery.cgi?m=notenoughbricks

author: hustla187
title: My Name Is....
review: If you want a Lego styled name keychain, this is it. You get at least 2 sets of the alphabet but you might need to buy more if your last name is Zzagazaza or something like that. Overall, this is really good.
